content.text:
# Watan, Republic of Tatarstan

}}
Watan () is a rural locality (a derevnya) in Yuğarı Oslan District, Tatarstan. The population was 24 as of 2010.
Geography
Watan, Republic of Tatarstan is located 22 km south of Yuğarı Oslan, district's administrative centre, and 55 km southwest of Qazan, republic's capital, by road.
History
The village was established in 1923.
Until 1927 was a part of Zöyä Canton; after the creation of districts in Tatar ASSR (Tatarstan) in Tämte (1927–1931), Yuğarı Oslan (1931–1963),  Yäşel Üzän (1963–1965) and Yuğarı Oslan districts.
